metadata.title: CVE-2018-14721 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.7 might allow remote attackers toconduct server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks by leveraging failure toblock the axis2-jaxws class from polymorphic deserialization.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
